admission_text:
# **AVA  
Membership**

## **JOIN US FOR A YEAR  
**

To join, extend, or offer the gift of membership, choose a level from the options below. In addition to tangible benefits, there’s an invaluable sense of satisfaction in recognizing that your support of AVA and the arts contributes to the enrichment of people’s lives!

## ****STANDARD****  
MEMBERSHIP  
LEVEL

INDIVIDUAL $55.00

FAMILY $75.00

[BUY NOW](https://26497.blackbaudhosting.com/26497/AVA-Membership)

## ****ARTIST****  
MEMBERSHIP  
LEVEL

$120.00

[BUY NOW](https://26497.blackbaudhosting.com/26497/AVA-Membership)

## CONTRIBUTOR****  
MEMBERSHIP  
LEVEL

$100.00

[BUY NOW](https://26497.blackbaudhosting.com/26497/AVA-Membership)

## PATRON****  
MEMBERSHIP  
LEVEL

$250.00

[BUY NOW](https://26497.blackbaudhosting.com/26497/AVA-Membership)

## SPONSOR****  
MEMBERSHIP  
LEVEL

$500.00

[BUY NOW](https://26497.blackbaudhosting.com/26497/AVA-Membership)

## BENEFACTOR****  
MEMBERSHIP  
LEVEL

$1000.00+

[BUY NOW](https://26497.blackbaudhosting.com/26497/AVA-Membership)
